TopicTitle: Better Atmospheres V4 vs Astronomer's Visual Pack V3

Articles.Content:
Which one of the two EVE packs listed in the title is the best?

What would happen if i tried to run the two of them at the same time?

the aurora's look better in astronemers

Edited June 1, 2014 by Kerbollo11

There are no auroras in BA. I personally like BA better, although I'd wish it had the bioluminescent Laythe clouds. BA also adds fog to Minmus (although I turned it a bit down on my personal install), and makes Mun, Moho, Tylo, Vall, Eeloo and Dres more glowy-ish, which I like quite a lot. It also uses the RSS plugin to fix kerbins atmosphere, so that it isn't so white in the horizon anymore.

There are no auroras in BA. I personally like BA better, although I'd wish it had the bioluminescent Laythe clouds. BA also adds fog to Minmus (although I turned it a bit down on my personal install), and makes Mun, Moho, Tylo, Vall, Eeloo and Dres more glowy-ish, which I like quite a lot. It also uses the RSS plugin to fix kerbins atmosphere, so that it isn't so white in the horizon anymore.

if you look at the sneak peaks you can see i like bit of of BA and AP but the clouds of kerbin look low res in at low orbit in BA
I cannot get any of these mods to install. Any help is appreciated. Ideally, I need someone to talk me through and install.
Make sure you have EVE installed already
